name: realtime-chat-app
description: Full-stack real-time chat application with React and Node.js

scripts.install:all: echo 'Installing dependencies...' && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend/RealTimeChaatapp && npm install
scripts.dev: echo 'Starting development servers...' && (cd backend && npm run dev &) && (cd ../frontend/RealTimeChaatapp && npm run dev)
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && echo 'Deploy backend to Render/Railway' && echo 'Push to GitHub and connect to platform'
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend/RealTimeChaatapp && echo 'Deploy frontend to Vercel' && echo 'Push to GitHub and connect to Vercel'
